title: Design for Ark Curtain with Menorah Encircled by Wreath,  for a St. Louis Synagogue
medium: Brush and gouache on silver patterned paper, residue of gold cellophane around edges, mounted on white cardboard
description: On silver patterned paper, a seven-branched blue menorah  in middle of orange circle with wreath of yellow leaves framing circle.
name: Drawing
